name: RTCTrackEvent.streams
description: The WebRTC API interface RTCTrackEvent's read-only streams property specifies an array of MediaStream objects, one for each of the streams that comprise the track being added to the RTCPeerConnection.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
refs.description: The definition of 'RTCTrackEvent.streams' in WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers.
